:::{#thm-d_omega-d_eta}
$$\derivf{\odds}{\logodds} = \odds$$

:::

---

::: proof

Using @thm-deriv-exp and @def-odds:

$$
\ba
\derivf{\odds}{\logodds} 
&= \deriv{\logodds} \exp{\logodds}
\\
&= \exp{\logodds}
\\
&= \odds
\ea
$$

:::

---

:::{#cor-d_omega-d_eta}

$$\derivf{\omega}{\eta} = \frac{\pi}{1-\pi}$${#eq-d_omega-d_eta}

:::
